name: NFL Street
summary: NFL Street is a series of sports video games developed by EA Tiburon and published by Electronic Arts It combines the talent and big names of the NFL with the atmosphere of street football

name: Amazing Island
summary: The black evil has taken over the island and the Maboo Tribe have called upon you to bring order and outcast the evil that has taken control To do so you must create your own creature and train it up entering it into various competitions against the black evil and working towards the main goal As the competitions are completed you will unlock new features to improve your own creature in speed strength and general looks  The main reason to do so are the mini games which the monsters can participate in While those rely on your active gamepad skills mostly pressing a button as fast as possible with minor variations the changes of success are dictated by the monsters statistics So for example a dragon would be beneficial for a flying mini game Those statistics can be further enhanced with items bought at shops  Play single and multiplayer battles on the GameCube or upload your creatures to the Game Boy Advance taking them on the road to challenge your friends and unlocking unique items and features for the creatures you design
